ygData.subject: Re: najena faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... so ...  What is the best way to adjust Solusek Ro Faction?  I know the named Orc in South Ro does. Anything else? like a HUGE faction
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
| From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
|
| luckily, the undead knight (the guy who makes shadow knight armor) has
| temple of solusek ro faction, NOT najena faction. so you can kill stuff in
| najena to your hearts content and he'll still like you. HOWEVER, since he
| appears in drelzna's room... it would be nice to have high najena faction
so
| you can survive the trip down there a bit more easily!
|
| Beld Demonblade
| Fennin Ro
|
<snip>

What is the best way to adjust Solusek Ro Faction? I know the named Orc in
South Ro does. Anything else? like a HUGE faction adjustment? What is the
starting/minimum Faction needed for this Undead Knight?

BTW.... Thank you very much for such a quick answer

--
Akenar "Cronik" Khaos <Dark Omen>
15th Season TSK
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
Bertoxx
